whatIs.title: What is Nostr
whatIs.p1: Nostr stands for Notes and Other Stuff Transmitted by Relays.Nostr has grown from 50 active users a year ago to 300,000 today.
whatIs.p2: Nostr is not an app or service that you sign up for, it's a permissionless open standard like TCP/IP and HTTP. Anyone can build on it without asking for permission from anyone. There is no one in control.
whatIs.p3: Nostr is designed for simplicity and enables people to participate in a decentralized social network. It can not only replace twitter/facebook/instagram/spotify/etc but can also replace companies that provide infomation exchange services.

nostrVsWeb3.title: Nostr vs Web3
nostrVsWeb3.p1: Hong Kong is currently pursuing Web3.
nostrVsWeb3.p2: Nostr + Bitcoin + Lightning is an organic form of "Web3" that has a chance of being around in 5-10 years.
nostrVsWeb3.p3: Nostr + Bitcoin + Lightning are networks and technologies that are discovered in response to real problems experienced by real people.
nostrVsWeb3.p4: These networks are rapidly growing without a development team, without a marketing team, without leadership, and without any form of capital raise.

join.title: Join the conversation
join.p1: Intoduce yourself to the HK community (or just say hi) on this thread to receive a DM about the next meetup.
join.p2: If you're new to to nostr, the most popular nostr apps are Damus (iPhone), Amethyst (Android), and iris.to (web).
